meanings.definition: A person who believes in or advocates for functionalism.
meanings.sent1: The functionalists in our class always talk about how things work together.
meanings.sent2: The functionalists gathered to discuss the benefits of a well-organized society.
meanings.sent3: The functionalists joked that everything in life should have a purpose, even jokes themselves.
meanings.sent4: The functionalists viewed society as a giant machine, with each individual playing a crucial role.
meanings.sent5: The functionalists were like puzzle solvers, always seeking the perfect fit for every piece.

meanings.definition: A group of individuals who adhere to the principles of functionalism.
meanings.sent1: At the conference, the functionalists presented their research on how systems function in harmony.
meanings.sent2: The functionalists met regularly to discuss the importance of efficiency in all aspects of life.
meanings.sent3: During the team-building exercise, the functionalists made sure every task had a clear purpose.
meanings.sent4: The functionalists saw society as a well-oiled machine, with each member contributing to its smooth operation.
meanings.sent5: The functionalists were like conductors in an orchestra, ensuring every instrument played its part perfectly.
